name: kookiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being unusual in appearance or behaviour, especially in a way that is interesting or attractive: The singer has always been associated with kookiness. She had a kookiness that set her apart. See
kooky
More examplesFewer examplesThe brightly coloured paint in the tea room gave it an air of kookiness.Her kookiness moved from being endearing to menacing.The film had the romantic kookiness of Annie Hall.
